(Yanshosh has the authorization to use Chordate and Smokescreen whenever he 
wants due to me having no time to participate with them)

Chordate/Smokescreen:



Chordate awoke from his post, looking around.  He heard a loud beeping, 
pressing a button, it ceased.  Looking over screens of each camera, he saw 
one that was flashing a light blue.  That meant to tell him where the trouble 
was.  Looking at the screen, he saw the bot that had been captured, or so he 
thought, who was now free.

"These idiots.  All you have to do is, is watch them?  Is that to much to 
ask?"

Chordate pressed several commands.


---

Two autoguns pop down from the cieling, one pointing at BrightBlade's head, 
one at the back of her knees.

---

Chordate activated the intercom for that room.  "Attention Predacon, stay put 
and don't try anything, or I will stop you with deadly repeat.  I repeat 
DEADLY force."

He activated the comm. on a secured Maximal frequency.  "This is Chordate, 
attention all available Maximals, a once captured intruder is FREE near CR 
chamber (instert # here), in sector (insert here).  Get there immediately, 
watch for autogun fire, and possibly flamethrowers.  Try to take the prisoner 
alive, but you have authorization to use deadly force."

-----

Smokescreen recieved Chordate's transmission.  "Smokescreen on it." he 
replied, taking out his weapon (sprays chemical that knocks people out, kinda 
like skunk's spray, only more powerful, etc, check in his profile).  He ran 
for the location given to him.
